captions.text: Hi , how are you doing?! My name is Otário ("Sucker")

And this video will be a little bit different from what you guys
are used to watch here on my Channel

I will try to give you a general idea of how much 
work it takes to make these videos

So, maybe you guys can help me up in
scripts or even on the production of new videos
Do you want to check it out? So here we go!

The first thing I do is to choose
a subject ...

whose focus is misleading advertising or deception
in general

Then I start the research ...
Sometimes it is necessary to buy the product,

visiting the company, make calls, talk to
consumer's agencies

And in a few days or weeks, I have to
become an expert on the subject!

All of this work is necessary to check whether
misleading advertisement actually exists!

And do not make any injustice or say 
something silly.

All data or numbers shown on videos,
must be obtained from reliable sources

As: government sites, national and international's organizations 
or even the site of the enterprises themselves

So I can stay legally protected against some company 
or even some nut who wants to sue me

Oh, on the research phase, 
one of the most important ingredients are added...

The anger and outrage!
Because it is at this stage that I discover all misleadings and deceptions that exists
And only after that i'm able to write the script.
And don't forget that without a good script, there is no video!
It may sound simple, but this is one of the most time demanding steps ...
There is no improvisation, everything must be planned and studied.

And do you know what happens when I finish writing
a script and think it is a peace of shit?

And then I have to start all over again.
I never post a video just for posting

or to make some funny faces
Actually, my videos may be funny,
but their purpose is not to entertain, but to inform!

And to became a nightmare for companies
or people who promote misleading advertising!
And those who follow this Channel,

know that since I started posting videos,
many coincidences happened,

for the dismay of some and joy of many!
Buuuuh

When the script is finished, I start
recording the voice ...

And only after that, I'm able to record the images where
the Sucker appears

Do you think it's over?
This is just the beginning ...

Then I still have to do the tracking of
Sucker's face, insert the eyes, nose,

mouth, add expressions to the face, making
the lip sync, change the background,

besides correcting flaws
Wow ... that's a lot o thing!

But wait, because there's still more!
I have to work on the scenes where there are only

images and special effects ...
As: explosions, cars being trampled by

paws ox, more explosions, exploding heads,
fire, water, more explosions, torn notes,

roadkill, shots and much more ...
And when I don't know a particular effect

I have to find out how to do that
Ah! Besides, I still have to modify

the logos of companies and create unique images
to be displayed at the channel.

After all that, the video is almost
ready ...
There remains only render, cut the scenes, put sound effects,

transitions between images, review everything like 10 times,
upload, wait Youtube processing

update facebook, Google +, Website ....
and there is still the subtitles in Portuguese,

English and other languages
Wow! Now it's over!!

Easy, huh?
But still missed something!

It is necessary to re-edit the videos by removing
all swearing (or bad words)

and unpolite gestures to put in my Second Channel or 
the Channel Without Swearing
Did you like it?! Did you get an idea of things works?

See how hard it is to create these videos?! 
Did you get why the videos take so long to be created?

Then click on the like button, 
favorite it and share the videos

What? Do you think it was too fast and wants
to see detailed information of each step?

Calm down, because I left the best for last ...
If you guys really liked this idea,
I will create the a 3rd channel, whose name should be "Responses",
F.A.Q., or the whatever name you guys think is best

where I can post videos with detailed information
of each step of the video's creation,

showing equipment, tutorials, plus
videos with F.A.Q. and much more!!

The good thing is that this kind of video
does not need much preparation ...
And they can be made more frequently

And don't worry, because the videos of the main Channel
and Second Channel, will continue normally
Wooooow that's coooooool!

Many people still don't know, but I do
all this work by myself (i.e. alone)...

Including answering emails, facebook, youtube,
twitter, manage and publishing posts on the site.
Well, everything! I'm almost working 16hrs a day on the channel.
So if you wanna help, the simplest thing to do is touting the channel
Liking, Favoriting and sharing the videos

Another way is buying the T-shirts, stickers,
dolls and accessories in the Channel's Shop
And for those who want to help financially

just visit the website of the channel (on the contact menu)
and check the link to make donations (via paypal)
And wait, soon I'll bring even more news
Ow shit! Let me fix that!
